* spring

* annotations
** @Entity
** @Id
** @GeneratedValue
   @GenerateValue(strategy=GenerationType.AUTO)
** @ManyToMany
** @JoinTable
   @JoinTable(name="name",joinColumns=@JoinColumn(name="book_id"),inverseJoinColumn=@JoinColumn("author_id"))
** @ElementCollection
